StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Technical Support Engineer with 1+ years of work exposure in VOIP technologies, IOS Application Development and Data Science, Currently working with Cisco System Pvt. LTD. Looking for opportunities in Data Science

PositionHistory.Title: Technical Support Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: (Cisco Unified Call Manager Product Team) Working as a Technical Support Engineer at Cisco Technical Assistance Center with specialization in VOIP technologies and Cisco Unified Call Manager. Have great exposure of working with clients among fortune 500 companies and Government associates throughout the globe. My work over here makes me a self-starter who takes initiative, displays leadership and provide effective support to team members and clients.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 86% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Junior Associate- Trainee Technology
PositionHistory.Description: Worked as Trainee Technology learning new trends in Mobile App Development specially in iOS Application Development - Swift Language. Technologies such as persistent storage techniques Core Data. UIKit, Core Machine Learning. Backend Handling using Firebase. Using and Intergration of Third Party API's. Other Duties to learn responsibilities that play important part in Software Development Lifecycle.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Computer Science and Engineering) from Pranveer singh institute of technology, kanpur in 2017
